short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Personalized discounts from your favorite brands

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We are reinventing discounts by offering a personal approach! ✨
Get personalized deals from your favorite brands based on your interests.🤩
 
🤓Imagine getting an extra 15% discount from Nike just because they know you are a loyal customer. Doesn’t it sound great? 😻
 
Pelican is free,✅ and it will take you 2 clicks to add it to your chrome browser.⚡️
 
While you are spending your time online💻, we will gather the best deals and coupons and match them to your interests.🪄
 
Pelican is a 100% private platform🔒, where discounts are undisclosed and provided solely based on customer interests and behavior. 🧲
 
✅Get discount coupons from online and offline stores, provided personally to you, by the brands you love.❤️
